story_09_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! More of those
baddies are heading right this way!
story_09_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Wait a sec... Isn’t that the Champion of
the Unova region?
story_09_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Guess today’s our lucky day.
C’mon, let’s nab her Pokémon!
story_09_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], these thugs are
trying to steal Iris’s Haxorus!
story_09_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Wha—? My Haxorus?!
We can’t let that happen!
story_09_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Right—we have to do something about this.
If we don’t stop them soon, even more innocent
people will get dragged into the fray!
